present.title: POS / mPOS
present.desc: Physical and mobile terminals with chip, magstripe, and contactless. Integrated with backoffice and reporting.

present.title: Tap to Phone (white label)
present.desc: Contactless acceptance on smartphones. Agile onboarding, KYC, and centralized management.

present.title: In-store Eloop
present.desc: Digitalization of deposits, withdrawals, reconciliations, and audits with traceability.

present.title: In-person Tokenization
present.desc: Secure vault for card reuse and omnichannel experiences.

notPresent.title: Payment Gateway
notPresent.desc: E-commerce gateway with antifraud, 3DS, split, multi-acquirer, and fallback.

notPresent.title: Recurring Payments
notPresent.desc: Subscription engine with proration, scheduled debits, and failure alerts.

notPresent.title: RT-Payments (Visa Direct / MC Send)
notPresent.desc: Send and receive funds 24/7 for refunds, disbursements, and remittances.

notPresent.title: Mobile Wallet + QR
notPresent.desc: Static/dynamic QR, NFC, loyalty, and service payments with smooth UX.
